Package com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite

Provides the classes necessary for SQLite object-relational mapping.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SqliteOperations
    This interface specifies methods for basic SQLite operations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SqliteTypeAdapter<T>
    Facilitates the mapping of Java data types to columns in a SQLite database and vice versa.
    SqliteUtils
    This class contains utility methods for generating SQL strings for a SQLite database.

Package com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite Description

Provides the classes necessary for SQLite object-relational mapping.
